column5: help! I need to decide between headwaters lake and brownstone lake. both are with excellent adventures/cat island lodge. I spoke with the owner this morning but wanted your opinions. we have two newbies coming and I want easy walleye fishing for them. I also like to chase big pike around. this trip will be either the second or third week of july 2019. thanks for you help
Headwaters, hands down. Have been to both.

Headwaters is by far one of my favorite lakes. Decent walleye and big pike if you know where to look. One trip there I caught two pike in the high 40" range on Johnson silver minnows with a white tail "burned" thru the reeds.
